data.title: Cute Photos Of Ronnie And Shamari DeVoe's Sons
data.meta_description: We're all about these twin bundles of joy.
data.text:
Cutie pies alert!

Bell Biv DeVoe’s Ronnie DeVoe and his wife Shamari DeVoe have twins sons who are making fans’ day each time they pop up on their Instagram feeds.

The proud parents welcomed their tiny tots, Ronnie III and Roman, in October 2017, and since their birth the couple has proudly showed off their adorable baby boys for the ‘Gram.

Here are just a few of the times, these twins gave us life.

The couple, who tied the knot in a double wedding with DeVoe’s New Edition and BBD bandmate Ricky and Amy Bell in March 2006, announced their pregnancy news on Instagram in February 2017.

We can’t get enough of these twins!
